name: Rebind (Barwani)
description:
Rebind is a platformer where your moves are limited! Once you release a key on your keyboard, you can no longer use it! You play as a treasure hunter who has become weary from his travels, and you must use your limited energy reserves to find the treasure before you get stranded!  Utilise good timing and resource management skills to reach the treasure and become a famous treasure hunter! This game was made in less than 2 days for the Game Makers Tool Kit 2020 Game Jam. The theme for this jam was 'Out of Control'. Credits:
  • Sprites, Tileset and Background: Jesse Munguia 
  • Music and SFX: Hyperspace
  • Gameplay: Barwani
  • Level Design: PurplDude + Barwani
  • Chest: GrafxKid
Made Using:
  • the Godot Engine
  • Ableton Live
  • Paint.net
  • Aseprite
